topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b98f06368722375002f0a#post_557b98f06368722375002f0a
I've officially stopped giving a shit about that sort of thing nowadays cause all sides of the argument are fucking loonies.

"Women should be fully clothed cause women revealing their skin they shouldn't whore themselves out"
"Women should be free and topless cause women not showing their skin is oppressive"
"Women should wear what I'm comfortable with wearing because what is comfortable with how I wear is what is right"

If a woman wants to wear a Hijab then who the fuck cares?
If a woman wants to go around topless then who the fuck cares?
If a woman wants to go around wearing a t-shirt and pants who the fuck cares?


Society would be so much better if we never developed everyday clothing and were a bunch of nudists.  All this fucking drama about clothing is like the bear ankle debate just a modern version.

topics.body:
"@Background Pony #E4FF":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b9c7b636872404f000360#post_557b9c7b636872404f000360
Call me crazy, but I still think when we eventually do have real life cybernetics something like the Borg or Cybermen might happen, but that they'll be more along the lines of every type of morality police ideology merged into one literally shoving people into surgeries to remove their race, sex, sexual organs and such.

Hypothetical group, "Join Unity!  Together we will cure the world of all racial inferiority by removing your skin and remove your sexual organs to fight against sexual depravity and to stop the male gaze!"

Imagine if people that are racist, homophobic, sexist and hate sex had the ability to physically remove all physical things that make us different.  I don't think it will be Cybermen or a hivemind, but rather parents forcing their children to undergo surgery to rip off their skin and their sexual organs and remove their capability to have sex or dress in ways you don't like.  After all the only way to stop your children from dating people you don't like is to physically rip out their sexual organs and rip off their skin and replace it with metal.

I don't think it will be cybermen so much as extremists ripping off their children's skin and sex organs to prevent them from ever having sex or having any interest in sex or dressing in ways you deem "wrong".

Hypothetical group, "Join Unity!  Race, sex and sexuality are diseases and we are the cure!"

topics.body:
"@Background Pony #E4FF":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b9fa36368727d55001930#post_557b9fa36368727d55001930
The thing is though that a lot of assbackwards countries that are developing economically by the time we have full cybernetics will have access to that technology but hold the same ideology as what they used to have.

Imagine giving Pakistan cybernetics; they still use genital mutilation on women.  Imagine giving them the technology to rip out someone's sexual organs for cheap.  Sort of like a technological Burqa that they physically can *NOT* remove.

Imagine parents in say Pakistan being able to physically lock out their child's sexual drive and only allow it to a spouse of their choosing.  Don't like who they marry?  Physically throw out their reproductive organs you've been keeping on ice in the trash.
